fields.summary: Verify length of cmdline per OS

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description:
SCM-723 is an interresting issue: the cmdline fails and the first analyse by the user is that there's a quoting issue. In the end it was the length of the commandline.
Per OS the total length of the cmdline is restricted. It would help a lot if the user was warned when the cmdline exceeds the max length.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open
